title: Asynchronous Science Learning Design: Customized Online Courses Based on Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Course aimed at enhancing scientific problem-solving and self-directed learning competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete three weekly experimental modules using science simulation/VR content in asynchronous environments
Learners achieve an average accuracy of over 85% per week through integrated formative assessment questions
Learners participate in reflective questioning activities at over 90%, fostering the development of scientific thinking skills
Learners receive 100% of instructor feedback within 24 hours in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
